Living The Good Life At Lovely Lilli

Description:
Vibrant Locale, Urban Sophistication
Relishing an elevated setting on the tenth floor of Lucia, an exclusive apartment complex designed by esteemed architects Elenberg Fraser, this contemporary residence is a home unmatched in quality or setting. The apartment itself seamlessly integrates the indoors and outdoors via floor to ceiling windows which allow natural light and an outlook over the communal pool and gardens, Melbourne High School and the MCC Hockey Section whilst the complex boasts resort style facilities such as a lap pool, sauna, gymnasium, spa, lounge and lift access. Comprising of an open plan Miele equipped kitchen with integrated dishwasher, Caesarstone benchtops and concealed refrigerator recess which overlooks the lounge and dining area. A balcony flows from the lounge providing an ideal position for a morning coffee, there are two bedrooms with mirrored built in robes and a luxurious central bathroom with an oversized shower. Custom cabinetry conceals the European laundry, reverse cycle heating and cooling adds comfort and a security intercom entrance & storage cage ensures piece of mind. Moments from South Yarra Station, Vogue and Como Centre, the Yarra River bike and walking trails, Chapel Street and Toorak Roads trams, cafes, shops and restaurants, cementing this masterpiece as the ultimate inner city haven.

Description:
Designer Luxury in South Yarra
A breathtaking combination of Victorian elegance and refined designer style from B.E Architecture has created this absolutely stunning South Yarra sanctuary enviably situated walking distance to Fawkner Park, the Botanic Gardens, Toorak Road restaurants and boutiques, Prahran Market, South Yarra station and schools. Beautifully nestled within utterly captivating Zen style north-facing gardens, the impressively proportioned and lavishly appointed dimensions deliver peerless single level lifestyle appeal.
While tuck-pointed Hawthorn bricks and a tessellated verandah highlight the exterior allure, the magnificent interiors feature high vaulted ceilings and bespoke joinery throughout. The wide arched hallway introduces a serene main bedroom with marble gas fire, opulent dressing room and a lavish en-suite overlooking a Japanese style courtyard. There is also a second gorgeous bedroom with gas fire, third double bedroom with built in robe, a fitted study and stylish bathroom. Palatial in scale, the sumptuous living and dining room warmed by a gas fire opens through French doors to a leafy west-facing decked garden. Framed by vast expanses of north and west-facing glass overlooking the lush landscaped garden oasis, the state of the art gourmet kitchen and sensational dining area are appointed with a built in timber table, stone benches, Liebherr fridge/freezer, a butler's pantry and wine cellar. An extension of the living and dining spaces, the spectacular garden also features a large covered al fresco terrace with BBQ, bar fridge and Jetmaster fireplace.
Comprehensively appointed with alarm, video intercom, keypad entry, heating and cooling, laundry, water tanks, irrigation, off street parking for 2 cars and auto gates.
Land size: 518sqm approx.
